channel.title: Starting on Playful Explorations Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Starting on Playful Explorations Lab

item.title: HJ Story on App Camp
item.description: This week the Herald Journal published a story about the experience both mentors and campers had at our 2018 Appcamps. For a full story, go to: https://www.hjnews.com/news/education/kids-pick-up-coding-skills-at-usu-app-camp/article_9a401c64-aae8-5d97-9b82-518e416604af.html
